column5: HCLP imagine management going out and trying to pitch institutional investors right nownot even a buyout candidate with all that debt on the books Only saving grace would be pricing pickup for Permian sand which SLCA did not see happening for ATLEAST the next few quarters Not a good bet

HCLP CVIA SND SLCA to be honest If you are an exec why wouldnt you just throw away and buy say 10000 50000 or 100000 shares You would think any nominal buy would help keep your business around a few extra months and your lofty salary too keep employee moral up keep debt collectors at bay keep customers satisfied and keep suppliers calmI realize it would be all slight of hand but that is what leaders do They lead by example I would much rather see a little moral pumping than staying crickets crickets The writing is on the wall Dead to rights
